lyrics:
4 contributorsfind another girl lyricschorus
find yourself another girl
who will love you true true true
find yourself another girl
save her love and kisses just for you
save her love and kisses just for you

verse 1
the very first time i fell in love got my heart broken then
people would say when i passed their way
theres a hurt young man going there going there
an unhappy lad going there

verse 2
well one day my mother called me to her side
said son why you so blue
mother i lost the girl that i love why wont you tell me what to do
mother wont you tell me what to do

chorus
she said find yourself another girl
who will love you true true true
find yourself another girl
save her love and kisses just for you
save her love and kisses just for you
see the hives liveget tickets as low as 66you might also likeverse 3
i can imagine how you feel my son
but throw it out of your mind
im going to tell you kind of truthfully
true love is hard to find sometimes its kinda hard to find

verse 4
but forget about that girl that broke your heart
and try and start anew
for if there was a guy for her
theres got to be a girl somewhere for you
got to be a girl somewhere for you

chorus
you just go on and find yourself another girl
who will love you true true true
find yourself another girl
save all her love and kisses just for you
save all her love for nobody but you

outro
ooh another love
ooh another love
ooh another love
save her love and kissses just for you
save all her love for nobody but youembed
